byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR and JULIE HIRSCHFELD DAVIS

abstract: White House Letter; New York Times White House correspondents Michael D Shear and Julie Hirschfeld Davis discuss their views on movie Southside With You, fictionalized version of first date between Barack Obama and Michelle Robinson.
snippet: Two White House correspondents discuss a new film about Barack and Michelle Obama’s first date: “It wasn’t that great of a date!” And, “It sure went on a long time.”...
lead_paragraph: Two White House correspondents discuss a new film about Barack and Michelle Obama’s first date: “It wasn’t that great of a date!” And, “It sure went on a long time.”

headline.main: Watching the Obamas’ First Date, and Feeling a Little Uncomfortable
headline.print_headline: An Awkward First Date, for Viewers
